typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> PrimarySource
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReferenceData
PrimarySource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PruneCols
